title: Strengthening CS Practical Competencies: Machine Learning Strategies for TADF Molecule Development

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Explain the photophysical properties of TADF molecules and their applicability to OLEDs
Implement a material design process using machine learning models step-by-step
Interpret NMR and photoluminescence spectroscopy data to evaluate molecular performance
Analyze TADF material development cases to design science inquiry activities applicable to educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
